title: Ep. 66 "Just The Two Of Us"
description:
This week it's just the two of us! Kiki & Medinah Monroe holding it down. We touch bases on the last few episodes, crushing on guests, buying condoms, and who whether we want a solid 10 in the bedroom or a better than average 7. Remember to leave a review on iTunes and comments on Soundcloud!
